concept.title: Upload Button Text Strings
concept.shortdesc: You can modify these text strings for the Upload Button.

row.entry: Choose the App you will use to display the content from the Upload Button. You can not display the Upload Button in Polls, Trending, or Storify 2. Set the destination to Moderate to moderate content users upload using the Upload button.
Configure the corners of the buttons to be rounded or square.
Choose whether site visitors can use the upload button to post text, photos, or videos. If an site visitor is not authenticated, they will not be able to use the Upload Button.
Enable site visitors to enter a title with the content they upload. By default, site visitors can comment. Enabling this makes a title and comment as part of the content the site visitor uploads.
Require site visitors to upload a photo or video in order to post content using the Upload Button.
Configure the text displayed on the Upload Button.
Title of the window that displays when the site visitor clicks the Upload Button.
Text that displays in the window where the site visitor uploads content after they click the Upload Button.
Allow the site visitor to enter a title with their upload. You can modify the content that displays here if you selected “Include Title.”
Allow the site visitor to enter a message with their upload.
The title of the window that confirms to the site visitor that they uploaded content successfully.
The text that displays in the window that confirms to the site visitor that they uploaded content successfully.
The text of button that displays in the window that confirms to the site visitor that they uploaded content successfully.
Enable a header to provide context to site visitors. You can choose to add the header to the top or the right of the button.
The text to use for the title of the header.
The text to use in the header.
